Testcase Steps:
1)"Start"
2)"The  user  needs  to  unsubscribe  to  stop  receiving  the  alerts"
3)"User  selects  the  Appliance_type  on  which  they  want  to  stop  getting  alerts"
4)"the  user  wants  to  stop  the  alert  for  a  specific  appliance   ?"
5)"the  User  clicks  on  that  appliance"
6)"User  clicks  on  Actions  drop  down  tab"
7)"User  selects  Manage  Alerts"
8)"the  User  wants  to  Turn  off  the  Alert  permanently   ?"
9)"click  on  the  Turn  Off  button"
10)"The  user  selects  the  number  through  the  dropdown  mentioned  below"
11)"User  selects  the  parameter  days/hours  through  the  next  drop-down  menu"
12)"the  user  wants  to  save  the  changes ?"
13)"click  on  the  Save  button"
